roleset.name: hit
roleset.note: WHACK-V NOTES: Member of Vncls hit-18.1. (from whack.01-v)
WHACK-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to whack.01-v. Whack.01-v is a member of VN cass hit-18.1. Framed by Katie. (from whack.01-n)

role.descr: instrument, thing hit by or with

example.name: instrumental subject
example.text: Some lousy earnings reports whacked the stock market, but bond prices fell only slightly and the dollar rose a little against most major currencies.

example.name: agentive
example.text: John whacked the fence with a stick.

example.name: often appears with a LV
example.text: Then I ran over and took a whack at the door

roleset.name: remove
roleset.note: WHACK_OFF-V NOTES: There's another sense for "whack off", but I'm not going there. No Vncls. (from whack.02-v)

example.name: no source
example.text: ``It's madness -- that in an hour you can whack off so much value,'' says Stanford Calderwood, chairman of Trinity Investment Management Corp., Boston.

example.name: arg2 as source
example.text: It includes *trace* whacking $242 million in good will off of the books...
